Get your music discovered

About Us

What We Do

Create

We produce high-quality music content directly for YouTube, crafting engaging tracks that resonate with global audiences.

Promote

We leverage our expertise to amplify your music across YouTube, maximizing visibility and growing your fan base.

Collaborate

We partner with artists to create original productions, offering a launchpad for talent through our influential YouTube presence.

OUR BRANDS

We manage top-tier music channels with over 20 million subscribers

Produce and promote your music through our network of genre-spanning YouTube channels, specializing in instrumental and vocal-free music. Our portfolio includes ambient, lo-fi, classical, jazz, and more. Our established platforms offer unparalleled exposure and monetization opportunities for emerging and established composers alike.

Check them out

Instrumental Oasis

Your destination for the finest free instrumental music on YouTube. Instrumental Oasis offers something for every mood and moment, with genres ranging from ambient and lo-fi to classical, jazz, and electronic. Our 3 million subscribers enjoy new, high-quality instrumental tracks every single day!

3M SUBSCRIBERS / 23M AVERAGE VIEWS PER MONTH / 7.6M HOURS WATCH TIME PER MONTH
Read More

Sci-Fi Central

Sci-Fi Central brings together a community of sci-fi enthusiasts from around the world to YouTube. The channel hosts science fiction based movies and series as well as documentary content, with some of the most popular offerings based on aliens, UFO and the paranormal. With Sci-Fi Central Originals making their way to the channel in 2022 we’ve got so much exciting exclusive content to come!

550K SUBSCRIBERS / 5.86M AVERAGE VIEWS PER MONTH / 1.6M HOURS WATCH TIME PER MONTH
Read More

Horror Central

For all things that go bump in the night, if scary movies are your thing then Horror Central has something for you. With a community of 400,000 subscribers Horror Central is the spookiest channel on YouTube.

400K SUBSCRIBERS / 2.63M AVERAGE VIEWS PER MONTH / 605K HOURS WATCH TIME PER MONTH
Read More

Family Central

Family Central is your destination for full free family movies! From comedy, pets and adventure to drama, we’ve got movies and shows for the whole family to enjoy.

305K SUBSCRIBERS / 5.45M AVERAGE VIEWS PER MONTH / 1.4M HOURS WATCH TIME PER MONTH
Read More

World Movie Central

Like your movies a bit more on the “Arty” side? World Movie Central has an ever-growing selection of Award Winning independent films in multiple languages from all over the world.

120K SUBSCRIBERS / 200K AVERAGE VIEWS PER MONTH / 100K HOURS WATCH TIME PER MONTH
Read More

True Crime Central

True Crime Central offers the best in True Crime documentaries and series. We bring crime episodes you haven’t watched anywhere else to YouTube.

320K SUBSCRIBERS / 4.33M AVERAGE VIEWS PER MONTH / 550K HOURS WATCH TIME PER MONTH
Read More

We Are Pride

We Are Pride celebrates and supports the LGBTQIA+ community around the world. Our aim is to provide a safe space that is a celebration of pride, individuality, diversity and sexuality. Our content ranges from the best reality, documentary, drama and movies from around the globe with something for everyone.

235K SUBSCRIBERS / 1.85M AVERAGE VIEWS PER MONTH / 110K HOURS WATCH TIME PER MONTH
Read More

Documentary Central

Documentary Central offers high quality documentaries covering a wide array of topics from climate change and the environment to history, royals, space, paranormal, animals and conspiracy theories.

125K SUBSCRIBERS / 908K AVERAGE VIEWS PER MONTH / 150K HOURS WATCH TIME PER MONTH
Read More

Craft Punk

Craft Punk is a bold and experimental Craft/DIY/How To channel focusing on fashion, upcycling and thrifting, decorating the home, craft challenges, simple craft hacks and personal vlogs. This is a space for self-expression, curiosity and celebration. Craft Punk unites lovers of craft and is home to some of the most gifted creators from Australia and around the world.

CREATOR: RACHEL BURKE / INSTAGRAM FOLLOWERS: 180K
Read More

Western Central

Love the stories of the wild wild west? Western Central brings back all of your favourite western classics to YouTube!

78K SUBSCRIBERS / 750K AVERAGE VIEWS PER MONTH / 325K HOURS WATCH TIME PER MONTH
Read More
